data.message: We apologize for the fact that we have mistakenly changed the name on our profile and we can no longer restore the old name, please change the current name that is quoted by the zoronjic kenan and put StilBetonZoronjic if it can. It's a business profile.

replies.message: Hi Kenan. To help make sure everyone uses their authentic name, you can only change your name every 60 days. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2vsRI90. -Ashley
60 days are so long,,,please allow us to change names wherever we want
Hi Iamokeraper! We appreciate the feedback! We'll be sure to pass this information along to our team.  Thanks! -Caitlin
Por que facebook no permite cerrar de una sola vez una cuenta  yo quise cerrar la mia y dice 7 dias

Hello, I've created a page on my FB account and I've added anonymous products, I asked them if I am  allow to advertise my product  and as you will see below they  allowed it and I started to advertise, I spent 425 € advertising until They deactivate my advertising account. I asked them reputedly  to send me a contact number to  call them but without any response,

Hi Konstantinos. Your account may have been disabled for not following Facebook's Advertising Guidelines: http://bit.ly/2f438MZ. If you believe your ad account may have been disabled by mistake, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2u5CS6l. -Ashley
